name: Paildramon
effect: ＜DNA Digivolution: 0 from blue Lv.4 + green Lv.4＞ Digivolve unsuspended with the 2 specified Digimon stacked on top of each other.[When Digivolving] When DNA digivolving, return 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 6000 DP or less to the bottom of its owner's deck.[When Attacking][Once Per Turn] Unsuspend this Digimon.
